rules.ruleString: Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {MKF3461, MKG2460, MKW2211, MKW2460, MKW3461}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {MKC2110} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Must be enrolled in course type {09, 09-4, 10, 41, 50}

description: This unit builds on MKC1200 by extending the issues relating to communication. Conceptual framework for the planning, integration and control of the communication process; determining the communication options available to organisations; developing realistic communication objectives for different types of marketing communication; budgeting and allocating resources to the communication elements within the budget. Evaluating the effectiveness of the marketing communication plan and the strategic use of the techniques of advertising, sales promotion, publicity/PR and personal selling, sponsorship, direct marketing and the use of communication in electronic commerce.
